languages.text: "Оно свершилось, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}оборвали жизнь той{/d}, что заставила Футфол пылать. Как я был слеп, считая Инцендию праведницей, когда она была лишь паразитом, выползшим из нутра ложного бога! Теперь же я зрю то, что застилал от меня морок подобострастного преклонения перед немощным трупом. Я зрю тропу, по которой пойду сам, и по которой поведу свою паству". {n}Изо рта старика, раскрытого в кривой улыбке, выбирается черная муха и юрко переползает в ноздрю проповедника.{/n}

"It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

Теперь же я зрю то, что застилал от меня морок подобострастного преклонения перед немощным трупом. languages.text: 「それは起こったのだ。我らはフットフォールに火を放った者の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}生を終わらせた{/d}。偽の神の臓腑から這い出た寄生虫に過ぎないインセンディアを正義と思い込むとは、私の目もとんだ節穴だった！今なら、無力な死体への隷属的な崇拝が覆い隠していたものも見える。私が歩む道、子羊たちを導くための道は見えているのだ」{n}プリーチャーの歪んだ口から黒い蝿が現れ、その鼻の中に入り込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それは起こったのだ。我らはフットフォールに火を放った者の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}生を終わらせた{/d}。偽の神の臓腑から這い出た寄生虫に過ぎないインセンディアを正義と思い込むとは、私の目もとんだ節穴だった！今なら、無力な死体への隷属的な崇拝が覆い隠していたものも見える。私が歩む道、子羊たちを導くための道は見えているのだ」{n}プリーチャーの歪んだ口から黒い蝿が現れ、その鼻の中に入り込む。{/n}

languages.text: « Ce qui est fait est fait. Nous avons {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}écourté la vie{/d} de celle qui avait mis Castel à feu et à sang. Comment ai-je pu être assez aveugle pour croire qu'Incendia était juste, alors qu'elle n'était qu'un parasite s'extirpant des entrailles d'un dieu imposteur ? Aujourd'hui, je vois enfin ce que m'avait caché le cloaque d'une adoration servile envers un cadavre impuissant. Je vois le chemin que je vais emprunter, celui sur lequel je conduirai mon troupeau. » {n}Une mouche noire s'échappe de la bouche tordue du vieux prêcheur pour se glisser dans sa narine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui est fait est fait, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. Nous avons écourté la vie de celle qui avait mis Castel à feu et à sang. Comment ai-je pu être assez aveugle pour croire qu'Incendia était juste, alors qu'elle n'était qu'un parasite s'extirpant des entrailles d'un dieu imposteur ? Aujourd'hui, je vois enfin ce que m'avait caché le cloaque d'une adoration servile envers un cadavre impuissant. Je vois le chemin que je vais emprunter, celui sur lequel je conduirai mon troupeau. » {n}Une mouche noire s'échappe de la bouche tordue du vieux prêcheur pour se glisser dans sa narine.{/n}

languages.text: “这一切都结束了，我们{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}杀死{/d}了那些将落脚港付之一炬的人。我以前是多么盲目啊，我误以为因森蒂娅是正义的化身，可她不过是从伪神的肠子里爬出来的寄生虫罢了！那些人崇拜着一具孱弱不堪的尸体，我也曾被他们的邪说蒙蔽，可现在，我已经看到了真相。我已经认清了我要走的道路，也认清了我的人民将随我走向何方。”{n}一只黑色的苍蝇从老人歪斜的嘴巴里飞了出来，溜进了布道士的鼻孔中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这些事情都过去了，{mf|孩子|女儿}。我们杀死了那些将落脚港付之一炬的人。我以前是多么盲目啊，我误以为因森蒂娅是正义的化身，可她不过是从伪神的肠子里爬出来的寄生虫罢了！那些人崇拜着一具孱弱不堪的尸体，我也曾被他们的邪说蒙蔽，可现在，我已经看到了真相。我已经认清了我要走的道路，也认清了我的人民将随我走向何方。”{n}一只黑色的苍蝇从老人歪斜的嘴巴里飞了出来，溜进了布道士的鼻孔中。{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist vollbracht. Wir haben das Leben der Frau {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}beendet{/d}, die Footfall in Brand gesteckt hat. Wie blind war ich, Incendia für rechtschaffen zu halten, wo sie doch nur ein Parasit war, der aus den Eingeweiden eines falschen Gottes gekrochen kam! Jetzt erkenne ich, was der Sumpf unterwürfiger Bewunderung für eine machtlose Leiche vor mir verborgen hatte. Ich sehe den Pfad, den ich beschreiten werde, den Pfad, der mich zu meiner Herde führen wird." {n}Eine schwarze Fliege kriecht aus dem verzogenen Mund des alten Mannes und läuft in ein Nasenloch des Predigers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie wurde vollzogen, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Wir haben das Leben derjenigen verkürzt, die Footfall in Brand gesteckt hat. Wie blind war ich, Incendia für rechtschaffen zu halten, wo sie doch nur ein Parasit war, der aus den Eingeweiden eines falschen Gottes gekrochen kam! Jetzt erkenne ich, was der Sumpf unterwürfiger Bewunderung für eine machtlose Leiche vor mir verborgen hatte. Ich sehe den Pfad, den ich beschreiten werde, den Pfad, der mich zu meiner Herde führen wird." {n}Eine schwarze Fliege krabbelt aus dem verzogenen Mund des alten Mannes und läuft in ein Nasenloch des Predigers{/n}

"Es ist vollbracht. Wir haben das Leben der Frau beendet, die Footfall in Brand gesteckt hat. Wie blind war ich, Incendia für rechtschaffen zu halten, wo sie doch nur ein Parasit war, der aus den Eingeweiden eines falschen Gottes gekrochen kam! Jetzt erkenne ich, was der Sumpf unterwürfiger Bewunderung für eine machtlose Leiche vor mir verborgen hatte. Ich sehe den Pfad, den ich beschreiten werde, den Pfad, der mich zu meiner Herde führen wird." {n}Eine schwarze Fliege kriecht aus dem verzogenen Mund des alten Mannes und läuft in ein Nasenloch des Predigers.{/n}

languages.text: «Así ha tenido que ser. Hemos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}acortado la vida{/d} de quien prendió fuego a Paso. ¡Qué necio fui al creer que Incendia estaba en lo cierto cuando no era más que un parásito saliendo de las entrañas de un falso dios! Ahora que se ha despejado la tormenta de sumisa adoración que tenía por un cadáver impotente, puedo ver lo que había detrás: el camino que emprenderé, el mismo por el que guiaré a mi rebaño». {n}De la torcida boca del anciano sale una mosca negra y se cuela por sus fosas nasales.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Así ha tenido que ser, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Hemos acortado la vida de quien prendió fuego a Paso. ¡Qué necio fui al creer que Incendia estaba en lo cierto cuando no era más que un parásito saliendo de las entrañas de un falso dios! Ahora que se ha despejado la tormenta de sumisa adoración que tenía por un cadáver impotente, puedo ver lo que había detrás: el camino que emprenderé, el mismo por el que guiaré a mi rebaño». {n}De la torcida boca del anciano sale una mosca negra y se cuela por sus fosas nasales.{/n}

languages.text: "Halloldu demek. Binliman'ı ateşe veren kişinin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}canını aldık{/d}. Ne kadar da körmüşüm, İncendia'nın erdemli olduğunu sanmıştım. Meğer sahte bir tanrının karnından çıkan bir asalakmış! Âciz bir cesede olan hayranlığımın ve hizmetlerimin görmemi engellediği şeyi artık görebiliyorum. Önümdeki yolu görebiliyorum, bu yolda sürüme önderlik edeceğim." {n}İhtiyar adamın çarpık dudaklarından bir sinek çıkıp vaizin burun deliğine giriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It was done. We {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}cut short the life{/d} of the one who set Footfall ablaze. How blind I was to think Incendia was righteous when she was only a parasite crawling out of the gut of a false god! Now I behold that which the morass of subservient adoration of an impotent corpse had shrouded from me. I see the path I will walk on, the path I will take to lead my flock." {n}A black fly emerges from the old man's crooked mouth and skitters into the preacher's nostril.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Halloldu demek. Binliman'ı ateşe veren kişinin yaşamını aldık. Ne kadar da körmüşüm, İncendia'nın erdemli biri olduğunu sanmıştım. Meğer sahte bir tanrının karnından çıkan bir parazitten başka bir şey değilmiş! Âciz bir cesede dair hayranlığımın ve hizmetlerimin görmemi engellediği şeyi artık görebiliyorum. Önümdeki yolu görebiliyorum, bu yolda sürüme önderlik edeceğim." {n}İhtiyar adamın çarpık dudaklarından bir sinek çıkıyor ve vaizin burun deliğine giriyor.{/n}
